history.proof: intros. apply map_app_inv in H. destruct H as [l [r [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. hauto l: on depth: 3use: map_cons_inv.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (ll : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), map f ll = y :: m -> {x : X & {l : list X | ll = x :: l /\\ f x = y /\\ map f l = m}}" on hypothesis of type "ll = l ++ r".

original: intros. apply map_app_inv in H. destruct H as [l [r [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. apply map_cons_inv in H1. destruct H1 as [x [l' [H4 [H5 H6]]]]. exists l, x, l', r. split. + rewrite H4. reflexivity. + split; [rewrite H2; reflexivity | split; [rewrite H5; reflexivity | rewrite H3; reflexivity]].
